data.expected_result: The roles are ordered normally with the one desired change
data.short_description: Roles get ordered incorrect when creating several in succession
data.steps_to_repro: - Progress to the Roles menu for any sever - Create the first role and without clicking anything, name it "1" - Create the 2nd role name "2", repeat until 5 - Create a 6th role - drag the 6th role to the middle of the roles
